DOC.brief_summary: Total hip replacement arthroplasty is a surgery having intra- and postoperative substantial blood loss. The investigators will investigate the relationship between the various hematologic variables and postoperative bleeding volume.
DOC.criteria: avascular necrosis of hip total hip replacement arthroplasty revision operation hematologic disease anticoagulant medication preoperative hemoglobin < 10 g/dl preoperative transfusion of red blood cells
